resources.string: Welcome abroad user! Let\'s sell new shoes today?

We are an Android application that will help you to sell your best shoes!

Please trust us in this moment, and after this screen you will explore a would of new and innovate application. I am sure that you will like it

Can we start?
Please, click in "Next" button and come with us to find your shoes!
Before we start, I would like to explain how this application works:

1- In the first screen, it is possible to see all your shoes for sale.

2- In the button bellow, you can add new shoes in the list.

3- After that your list will be updated with the new shoes.

4- Try to put more details as possible to sell more and more.

5- Have fun and good sales!
Here is your shoe list. Enjoy!
